price: Some people before you asked such questions, then became disbelievers as a result of that[68].
arabic: قَدۡ سَأَلَهَا قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡ ثُمَّ أَصۡبَحُواْ بِهَا كَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: [68] For not carrying out what they were commanded.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qad sa-alahā qawmun min qablikum thumma aṣbaḥū bihā kāfirīna
